column5: At the end of 2008 I posted a request for best 2008 posts and wanted to set up some kind of vote.  A lot of people referred to great repeat posters but there were not many specifics given.  It was agreed that there are a lot of good posts, pics and fish in 2008 and that it would be unfair to say anyone was the best.  Maybe next year there will be actual firm categories  I received a few PMs.  So if you want to see what others thought were notable in 2008 here is the original thread and links to a few other threads submitted by OFNers:  Thread: http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...mp;#entry281810  Leechman for his "2008 Full Report - Outaouais, From Hard to Soft Water until Now http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...c=25729&hl=  MooseBunk for his " The Arctic Expedition., Great Bear Lakers & Tree River Char. Report http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...mp;#entry246398  solopaddler for his " Alaskan Odyssey ~ Trout Bum For A Week http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...c=24345&hl=  limeyangler for his " 3 DAYS OF FISHING ( lots of pics and vid clips), finally caught a bass on wabigoon...20" !!! http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...c=22118&hl=  ccmt for his " My best day Muskie fishing ever! New PB pic...., Bly and I fished with Fishnsled today! http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...c=25205&hl=  JWL for his " another day on the bank, "The Slammers" take the lead over !!!!! http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...c=26315&hl=  steverowbotham for his " Thanksgiving Weekend Report *PICS " http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...c=24658&hl=

Ooops...sorry if I missed an email to me.  I was not deciding who to include and not include and there are so many posters there will be more that did not make it in the thread.  I always read Snag's stuff, they are never unentertaining (they are some of the best), I love his stuff too!  here are a couple of Snag posts that stuck in my mind: http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...mp;#entry272588 http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.p...mp;#entry251885
Umm...take mine off...thanks for the nomination, but I have no business being there with solopaddler and moosebunk...LOL.
I only posted what was sent to me , however, if there was a poster that repeated "new PB" more than anyone else I would bet it was CCMT
When you've only been fishing for 2 years getting PB's is pretty easy...and I post for both Bly and I....but thanks
Cliff, I am just happy to get an honorable mention from Mike  :)
And here I was thinking you were lousy at bragging

Same here Cliff.... It's flattering to be nominated but certainly don't belong in that list amongst the top posters like Moose and Solo..... I'm always in awe when I read their stories and adventures   Keep it up guys  I have a feeling we'll be treated to a bunk report soon....  Jacques aka Leechman
